subtasks.subtask: Pick up the white plastic cup from the left side of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The white plastic cup needs to be moved to the right side of the table, so it's necessary to pick it up first.
subtasks.move: Move the gripper towards the white plastic cup and close the gripper around it.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to lift the white plastic cup off the table.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The gripper might not be able to securely hold the white plastic cup if it's too small or slippery.
subtasks.solution: Solution: Ensure the gripper is properly calibrated and adjusted for the size and shape of the white plastic cup before attempting to pick it up.

subtasks.subtask: Move the white plastic cup to the right side of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: Once the white plastic cup is picked up, it needs to be moved to the desired location on the table.
subtasks.move: Move the gripper horizontally to the right side of the table and release the white plastic cup.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to place the white plastic cup on the right side of the table.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The white plastic cup might fall off the table if the gripper doesn't release it properly.
subtasks.solution: Solution: Ensure the gripper is set to release the white plastic cup gently and accurately onto the table surface.
